plot: Tracks the struggle of Riley, a Queer Woman of Color from the Midwest who moves to Oakland to transcend differences.
title: Logical Family

plot_en: Tracks the struggle of Riley, a Queer Woman of Color from the Midwest who moves to Oakland to transcend differences.
